title: Varvara Zelenskaya
summary: Varvara Vladimirovna Zelenskaya (Russian: Варвара Владимировна Зеленская, often transliterated as Warwara Zelenskaja; born 5 October 1972 in Petropavlovsk-Kamchatsky) is a retired Russian alpine ski racer. She is the most successful Russian female World Cup ski racer, winning a total of four races (Svetlana Gladishiva is the only other Russian woman to win a World Cup race).
